title: GMFB: The Ascent of Christian McCaffrey
itunes:title: GMFB: The Ascent of Christian McCaffrey
description:
On the #GMFB Podcast: Peter discusses still being on Martellus Bennett’s “list” (:50); Kyle & Peter recount the tale of their day at spin class (2:59); Kay talks about training for a half marathon (5:55); The team discusses the dominance of the Patriots in the AFC East (8:58) & if they could beat All-Star squad from the rest of the conference (12:11); The excitement of draft-day trades (18:34); Christian McCaffrey rising on draft boards and his future in the league (23:18); and finally, wrap up with some guesses on where a few notable names will be playing next season (31:38).

Learn more about your ad-choices at https://www.iheartpodcastnetwork.com

See omnystudio.com/listener for privacy information.
